<https://twitter.com/jacobian|@jacobian>: So much this. A physical breach is a nightmare scenario for infosec. 

On the off-chance that any of my followers are involved in this -- I do have some experience in scenarios like this and would be happy to help. If I can be of assistance hit me up. <https://twitter.com/mzbat/status/1346983709786976257>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/mzbat|@mzbat>: My heart goes out to the unsung IT heroes at the Capitol tonight. My guess is they’ve never had to run asset inventory IR before - a daunting, stressful task in a tabletop exercise - and they’re running one (prob w/o a playbook) following a full on assault of the Capitol.
attachments.text: My heart goes out to the unsung IT heroes at the Capitol tonight. My guess is they’ve never had to run asset inventory IR before - a daunting, stressful task in a tabletop exercise - and they’re running one (prob w/o a playbook) following a full on assault of the Capitol.
